effect.5pc: Increases the ATK of all party members by 15% for 30s upon healing allies.
Upon using Outro Skill, increases the ATK of the next Resonator by 22.5% for 15s.
Electro DMG + 15% after releasing Heavy Attack or Resonance Skill. This effect stacks up to 2 times, each stack lasts 15s.
While on the field, ATK increases by 5% every 1.5s. This effect stacks up to 4 times. Outro Skill DMG + 60%.
Fusion DMG + 30% for 15s after releasing Resonance Skill.
Aero DMG + 30% for 15s after releasing Intro Skill.
Spectro DMG + 30% for 15s after releasing Intro Skill.
Havoc DMG + 7.5% after releasing Basic Attack or Heavy Attack. This effect stacks up to 4 times, each stack lasts 15s.
Glacio DMG + 10% after releasing Basic Attack or Heavy Attack. This effect stacks up to 3 times, each stack lasts 15s.
Casting Resonance Skill grants 22.5% Glacio DMG Bonus for 15s and casting Resonance Liberation increases Resonance Skill DMG by 18%, lasting for 5s. This effect stacks up to 2 times.
Increase the Resonator's Coordinated Attack DMG by 80%. Upon a critical hit of Coordinated Attack, increase the active Resonator's ATK by 20% for 4s.
When Outro Skill is triggered, deal additional 480% Havoc DMG to surrounding enemies (considered Outro Skill DMG), and grant the incoming Resonator 15% Havoc DMG Bonus for 15s.
Inflicting Spectro Frazzle on enemies increases Crit. Rate by 20% for 15s. Attacking enemies inflicted with 10 stacks of Spectro Frazzle grants 15% Spectro DMG Bonus for 15s.
Increase the Resonator's ATK by 15%. Reaching 250% Energy Regen increases all Attribute DMG by 30% for the Resonator.

effect.3pc: Holding 0 Resonance Energy increases Crit. Rate by 20% and grants 35% Echo Skill DMG Bonus.

effect.5pc: Inflicting Aero Erosion upon enemies increases Aero DMG for all Resonators in the team by 15%, and for the Resonator triggering this effect by an additional 15%, lasting for 20s.
Casting Resonance Liberation grants all Resonators in the team 15% Fusion DMG Bonus and the caster 20% Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus, lasting for 35s.
Hitting a target with Aero Erosion increases Crit. Rate by 10% and grants 30% Aero DMG Bonus, lasting for 10s.

effect.3pc: Upon gaining a Shield, increase the Resonator's ATK by 6% and Crit. DMG by 4% for 4s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s and stacks up to 5 times.

Casting Echo Skill grants 30% Heavy Attack DMG Bonus to the caster for 4s. Additionally, all Resonators in the team gain 4% Echo Skill DMG Bonus for 30s, stacking up to 4 times. At 4 stacks, casting Echo Skill again resets the duration of this effect. Echoes of the same name can only trigger this effect once. The record of Echo triggering this effect is cleared along with this effect.
